text: Brian Mannion Dennehy (July 9, 1938 - April 15, 2020) was an American actor, director, and producer. Dennehy acted in many movies, such as First Blood, A Real American Hero, and To Catch a Killer. He won two Tony Awards and one Golden Globe Award. Dennehy died on April 15, 2020 at his home in New Haven, Connecticut, aged 81. The cause of death was cardiac arrest caused by sepsis. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Tony Award winning actors Category:Golden Globe Award winning actors Category:Drama Desk Award winners Category:Actors from Bridgeport, Connecticut Category:Writers from Connecticut Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:American television actors Category:American television directors Category:American television producers Category:American television writers Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest Category:Deaths from sepsis Category:1938 births Category:2020 deaths
title: Brian Dennehy
